class.name: ProfileDeferralMgr
class.javadoc: A class to manage the deferral of CMM initialization of profile data for internal ICC_Profile objects - i.e. when we "trust" that the profile data is valid and we think it may not be needed. An example is the sRGB profile which gets loaded by any program doing graphics, but which may not be needed if the program does not need high quality color conversion.
Records a ProfileActivator object whose activate method will be called if the CMM needs to be activated.
Removes a ProfileActivator object from the vector of ProfileActivator objects whose activate method will be called if the CMM needs to be activated.
Removes a ProfileActivator object from the vector of ProfileActivator objects whose activate method will be called if the CMM needs to be activated.
